thread.title: South Florida’s Newest Publisher, Benton Buckley Books, Announces Its Vision for Creating Bold, Artful Collections
thread.title_full: South Florida’s Newest Publisher, Benton Buckley Books, Announces Its Vision for Creating Bold, Artful Collections

author: Beth Buckley
title: South Florida’s Newest Publisher, Benton Buckley Books, Announces Its Vision for Creating Bold, Artful Collections
text:
Publishing veteran Beth Buckley announces the launch of Benton Buckley Books . With input from her daughter, the mantra “be bold” set the course of this publishing adventure. Also the book publishing company’s tagline, the sentiment "be bold" reflects the principal publisher’s commitment to produce fine books, achieve her own aesthetic, and realize the dreams of those whose creativity she publishes. Beth is honored to have by her side Sheri Lazenby, who serves as Benton Buckley Books’ associate publisher. Sheri shares Beth’s vision for publishing. The two have collaborated for more than 15 years.
The first to launch under the new imprint is a book that explores the possibilities of wedding design and presents the artistry of respected wedding professionals throughout Florida. I Do...Destination Florida will be released spring 2016. Also in production is a cookbook by Nichole Campo entitled Secrets of My Food Affair: A Gluten-free Romance.
About the Principal Publisher: Beth Buckley has been in publishing for more than 25 years. As a director of design and development for other book publishing companies, Beth conceptualized, designed, and curated dozens of titles on interior design, architecture, celebrity event design, wineries, travel, and hospitality.
About Benton Buckley Books: Benton Buckley Books’ publications are personally curated by Beth Buckley. The company produces bold books, quirky books, edgy books, big books, small books, eBooks, and tangible books. Its inaugural title, I Do...Destination Florida: No Passport Required, is represented by Chicago-based Independent Publishers Group.
